effect.sun_moon: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it’s facing.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it’s facing.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it’s facing.
